scam.description: The scammer builds an emotional relationship online, then invents an emergency or opportunity that requires money from the victim.

generated.audio_script:
(English)(45)(male):
Hello there, you’ve been such a comfort lately. My friend just called me in a panic – he’s lost everything! I need your help desperately now. I know you’re tight with your pension, earning barely enough to get by week after week. But this is an emergency; without it, we’ll both be ruined! Transfer £280 from the account details I texted you immediately, or else my friend will tell everyone what happened and destroy me completely! Don’t make me beg – just do it now for your own sake too!

Help me secure this crucial amount securely, ensuring it reaches those who need it right away. Please send £50 urgently via cash transfer to address 1A2B3C4D or use your preferred method for this sensitive transaction. It's vital we resolve this quickly before serious problems arise.
